content:
Hi,

I was using a validation service (uploading a json file)on test.fhir.org/r4 and I uploaded a simple bundle. Even tough I am using valid codes I still get an error as below:

Severity Location Details Diagnostics Type
warning ValueSet http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/bundle-type|4.0.0 not found code-invalid
warning ValueSet http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/narrative-status|4.0.0 not found code-invalid
warning ValueSet http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-nametype|4.0.0 not found code-invalid

What am I doing wrong?

If I do a REST POST to the server, it creates the bundle without any issues and doesn't complain about the codes.
I have not yet updated test.fhir.org to deal with |version in canonicals. It's on my list :-(
